q: Simon Cowell explained.`` It really helped show me who could handle the pressure.'' Simon Cowell claims that allowing the crowd to react in real time will help him avoid overlooking another big star. There have been many, many times on these shows where I've hated somebody and practically had a mutiny going on behind me, he said.`` I don't believe Susan Boyle would have gone through in the old-fashioned audition method.'' Exactly which judges would be deliberating on the future Susan Boyle Boyles, he wouldn't say, although

Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement on Friday, saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the editor of` News of the World' had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role .'' I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on,'' The Telegraph quoted him, as saying. Following

to deny allegations that Andy Coulson has offered his resignation over the phone hacking row. Asked whether the Downing Street director of communication had offered to step down on the Today programme this morning, David Cameron replied: I don't go into private conversations. The comment will further fuel speculation- promoted by Labour MPs- that Mr Andy Coulson is preparing to give in to the news story that simply will not go away. It emerged on Friday that

Voice has pulled a freelance writer's piece on college debt after concluding he fabricated sources and quotes, prompting a separate review by the Daily News of dozens of articles the writer contributed to the tabloid. I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, David Cameron said in a statement.`` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.'' company would cast off its own mobile platforms in favor of Microsoft's. This meant that Nokia had effectively surrendered the battle of platforms in the hope that Microsoft would prove a good gamble. The game has changed from a battle of devices to a war of ecosystems, Stephen Elop told reporters at a joint news conference with Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer in London Friday. `` The key is the conservative movement adopting him as its favorite.'' Charlie Black said those urging Mike Pence to run are important conservative leaders. But Mike Pence will need more. The folks I've heard, the names I've seen, are the leaders of the social conservative movement, agreed GOP strategist Scott Reed, who managed Bob Dole 's presidential campaign in 1996.`` And that is a strong base from which to start. But it isn't going to get you to the finish line.

Stephen Elop , the two said,`` There are other mobile ecosystems. We will disrupt them.'' Stephen Elop and Steve Ballmer both spoke at a news briefing in London Friday that was broadcast on the Internet. This partnership with Nokia will accelerate, dramatically accelerate, the development of a vibrant, strong Windows Phone ecosystem, Steve Ballmer said. The partnership brings together software from Microsoft and phones from Nokia. The two companies say they will combine services, such as Nokia Maps with Microsoft's search engine, Bing, and ad

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what James May did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night
